RelatedSentence: New Delhi : Presidents of Russia and France have congratulated Prime Minister - elect Narendra Modi on BJP 's landslide victory in the general election and hoped that bilateral ties will further improve and strengthen under his leadership .

In his message , Russian President Vladimir Putin congratulated Modi for BJP 's convincing victory and hoped that both the countries will be able to achieve greater success and further bolster the relationship .
